message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
